Name: Community
Description: In Season 2, Episode 14 ('Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'), the study group plays a game of D&D.

Name: Stranger Things
Description: D&D plays a significant role in the show's plot, and the kids frequently play the game.

Name: Freaks and Geeks
Description: In the episode "Discos and Dragons," the main characters play D&D.

Name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
Description: The kids play D&D in a couple of scenes in the movie.

Name: The Big Bang Theory
Description: D&D is referenced and played by the main characters in various episodes.

Name: Knights of Badassdom
Description: This horror-comedy film involves LARPing (Live Action Role-Playing), which has elements inspired by D&D.

Name: Mazes and Monsters
Description: A 1982 TV movie starring Tom Hanks, where the plot revolves around a fictional role-playing game similar to D&D.

Name: She's Out of My League
Description: D&D is mentioned and played in a scene.

Name: Community
Description: In Season 5, Episode 10 ("Advanced Advanced Dungeons & Dragons"), the group plays another game of D&D.

Name: Rick and Morty
Description: In the episode "Dungeons & Dragons & Rick & Morty," characters play a D&D-like game.

Name: Dark Dungeons
Description: A 2014 film based on a controversial anti-D&D tract, itself based on the "Dark Dungeons" comic by Jack T. Chick.

Name: Record of Lodoss War
Description: This fantasy anime has strong D&D influences in its setting and characters.

Name: Baldur's Gate
Description: A popular video game series that uses the D&D rules and takes place in the Forgotten Realms setting.

Name: Planescape: Torment
Description: An influential role-playing video game set in the Planescape campaign setting of D&D.

Name: Critical Role
Description: A group of voice actors play D&D in this popular web series and podcast.
